value:
$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face|...Hmph. Nothing. There's nothing
here! Was this all for nothing?$k$pWait... This gate here... Why do I feel
so drawn to it?$k$p$EFace_Anger|...How does it open? Damn it!$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Stop there! Any further violence will
not be tolerated.$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Who are you?!$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I am Henriette, Askr's queen and
sovereign after the passing of my
husband, King Gustav.$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face|Queen, hm? Open this gate, woman.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I will not. And I ask that you step
away from it, King Fáfnir. This place
is not for you.$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Silence! Shut your mouth and do
as I command!$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Rrraaagghh!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Mother! Let her go, Fáfnir!$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Impertinent woman... I should snap
your stubborn neck right here in front
of your weakling son!$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Rrgh... Guh! Alfonse...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Stop!$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Rrrr-rah!$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Pain|*gasp*$k$p*cough*$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Mother! Mother, are you all right?!$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Y-yes...$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...Ngh! Damn this headache...
Why does it throb like this?!$k$pEver since entering this country,
the more I kill, the more pain grips
at my chest, my throat...$k$p$EFace_Pain|Ngyah! ...My...my head!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...F-Fáfnir?$k$p

$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You, open this gate!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Fáfnir, what—$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Silence! Open it! Now!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I will not. I can't allow you to threaten
any other world!$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Impudent brat... I will open it myself!
By my power alone!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE05_04,0|$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Urgh... My...head... Can't muster...$k$pLost? ...To them?!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|W-we defeated Fáfnir... Even though
we stood no chance against him in
the past...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|This could be our chance to end all
of this here and now, even without
Gramr... We can defeat him!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Prince Alfonse, wait! Please!
Spare his life...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Yes. Of course... We will capture him
and hold him in a prison cell. That'll
put a stop to the war's spread.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Normal2|Fáfnir got his strength from the
Crown of the Dvergar, right?$k$p$EFace_Pain|Before we seal him away in prison,
we should probably take that, right?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Indeed. Let's do that now...$k$p$EFace_Anger|H-huh? I can't get it off!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...The Crown of the Dvergar can only
be removed by the one who wears it.
Or when the one who wears it dies...$k$pB-but please don't kill him!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Don't worry, Princess Reginn...
Though we will need to make his
prison cell as secure as we can.$k$p$Sbs150|
